name: Gear Aid Tenacious Clean Tape - Patches
description: Like the name implies, this strong, grippy tape can handle heavy-duty repairs. Ideal for mending sleeping pads, down jackets, tent flies, tarps, rain pants, and more.Clear adhesive doesn't leave sticky residue like duct tape can. Sticks to most surfacesContains tough tent fabric and aggressive adhesive.Use in conjunction with Seam Grip and urethane adhesives for ultra-strong repairs.Contains 4 circular patches 7.6cm, 2 black and 2 clear.
